sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { Home } from 'react-feather' const Crumbs = props => { const { history, location: { pathname } } = props; const pathnames = pathname.split("/").filter(x => x); return (
    {/* {pathnames.length > 0 ? (
  1. history.push("/app/home")}>
    2. ): (
  2. Home
    3. )} */} {pathnames.map((name, index) => { const routeTo = `${pathnames.slice(0, index + 1).join("/")}`; const isLast = index === pathnames.length - 1; return isLast ? (
  3. {name}
    4. ): (
  4. history.push(routeTo)}>{name}
    5. ) })}
) } export default withRouter(Crumbs)
